1.5.1.name: wordpress/get-better-excerpt
1.5.1.description: The Get Better Excerpt plugin works almost identical to the built in get_the_excerpt() and the_excerpt() functions except it returns whole words instead of cutting off the excerpt as the existing function does.

2.0.0.name: wordpress/get-better-excerpt
2.0.0.description: The Get Better Excerpt plugin works almost identical to the built in get_the_excerpt() and the_excerpt() functions except it returns whole words instead of cutting off the excerpt as the existing function does.
